posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content:
This one is a mix inspired by two of my favourite wizard builds : The Mestil hal-dead Juggernaut by Grizz and the Draconist Arcanist by Max Kane.
I want him to be as a Xenomorph (the Alien) : he can bite you, but if you injure him, you will be dissolved by his acid blood.

It is, of course, impossible to get the best of those two builds, so the idea was to find the best balance. The result is fun ; a naked magical berserker dwarf who run over his ennemies suited with nothing else than an acid aura.

special notes : For more playability you can add a bard level (at level 27 for exemple) to max taunt and UMD at this level

Pros : 
- 27 wizard levels = undispellable + high damage shields
- good SR for your IGMS ;
- metamagic : extend, maximized ;
- don't need still and autostill 'cause you fight naked ;
- good melee damages (2d4+16 unbuffed) ;
- two types of melee damages (scythe) ;
- four ways to kill : damage shields, IGMS, melee, invocations.
- More than 600 HP unbuffed (700 buffed) ;
- full taunt, discipline, concentration and UMD (for paladin and cleric buffs to boost your AB). ;
- RDD immunities ;
- high fortitude saves.

Cons :
- 36 ab (37 with song) is a bit low ( but you can taunt ennemis, and against high ac melee fighter your damages come from your damage shields) ;
- low reflex saves ;
- no crit immune ;
- late maturity and a bit unplayable at the begining.

EDIT : changed the level progression a bit : bard at level 5 instead of level 2, for more playability.
